00030   bool isOK() const {return !this->empty();}

00049     if (this != &z) {
00050       // we need new container
00051       this->resize(z.dim1);
00052       this->low1 = z.low1;
00053       this->dim1 = z.dim1;

00071   bool resize(int low,int upper) { // array with 1st index from 'low1' to 'upper1',
00072     this->low1 = low;
00073     this->dim1 = upper-low+1;
00074     this->init(dim1);
00075     return isOK();
00076   }
00087   bool resize(int dim1) {
00088     return resize(0,dim1-1);
00089   }
00095   bool resize(int dim1,int dim2,int dim3)
00096   {
00097     resize(dim1);
00098     if(dim2&&dim3)
00099       for(int i=0; i<dim1; i++)
00100         if(false==(this->array()[i]).resize(dim2,dim3)) {
00101           this->clear();
00102           break;
00103         }
00104     return isOK();
00105   }

00115   }
00117   void print() const {

00134   template <class T> size_t write(T x, FILE *fp,int i1=0,int i2=0) const {
00135     if(!isOK()) return 0;
00136     size_t cnt=0;
00137     fwrite(&dim1,sizeof(int),1,fp);
00138     fwrite(&low1,sizeof(int),1,fp);
00139     fwrite(&i1,  sizeof(int),1,fp);
00140     fwrite(&i2,  sizeof(int),1,fp);
00141     if(i1>=i2)
00142       for(int i=0; i<dim1; i++) {
00143         size_t n = (this->constArray()[i]).write(x,fp);
00144         if(n==0) return 0;
00145         cnt+=n;
00146       }
00147     else
00148       for(int i=i1; i<=i2; i++) {
00149         size_t n = (*this)[i].write(x,fp);
00150         if(n==0) return 0;
00151         cnt+=n;
00152       }
00153 
00154     return cnt;
00155   }
00167   template <class T> size_t read(T x, FILE *fp) {
00168     int i1=0,i2=0;
00169     fread(&dim1,sizeof(int),1,fp);
00170     fread(&low1,sizeof(int),1,fp);
00171     fread(&i1,  sizeof(int),1,fp);
00172     fread(&i2,  sizeof(int),1,fp);
00173     int upper1 = dim1+low1-1;
00174     if(!resize(low1,upper1)) return 0;
00175     size_t cnt=0;
00176     if(i1>=i2)
00177       for(int i=0; i<dim1; i++) {
00178         size_t n = (this->array()[i]).read(x,fp);
00179         if(n==0) return 0;
00180         cnt+=n;
00181       }
00182     else
00183       for(int i=i1; i<=i2; i++) {
00184         size_t n = (*this)[i].read(x,fp);
00185         if(n==0) return 0;
00186         cnt+=n;
00187       }
00188     return cnt;
